text.div:
careplan-activity-goal

Parameter activity-goal:reference

To alow a search (_include) on a Goal resources that are related to the CarePlan activities.

ResourceCarePlan
ExpressionCarePlan.activity.detail.goal
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: careplan-activity-goal
purpose: To search on a Goal resource, referenced from a CarePlan.activity.detail.goal. Main purpose is to use this search parameter for including Goal resouces in the result for a search on CarePlan.
description: To alow a search (_include) on a Goal resources that are related to the CarePlan activities.
